otherNames: Supreme God Emperor, 无上神帝
synopsis: Returning home, Mu Yun learned that he would marry Miss Qin Qin Mengyao. Qin Mengyao is cold and poisonous, but cannot live until he is 20 years old. The marriage was only for the benefit of the Qin family. However, under Mu Linchen’s persuasion, Mu Yun agreed to this family problem on alchemical terms.
